verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Kimya bara na bahari,
kimya Mbingu na dunia
Bwana Muumba wenu,
mtoto Yesu asinzia.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Kimya, kimya, asinzia,
mpenzi wetu Mtoto Yesu. x2

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Amelazwa manyasini,
mchanga mkiwa, myonge pia
Yosefu na Maria wamo,
mtoto Yesu kumtunzia.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Malaika wanashuka.
Mfalme wao kumlindia
wanatunga nyimbo nzuri,
mtoto Yesu kumwimbia.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Nasi pia twende hima
Mungu wetu kumwangalia
twende sote kwa juhudi
mtoto Yesu kumwamkia.
